lead_paragraph: Belgium's Greg Van Avermaet snatched gold in a thrilling finish to the men's Olympic road race, out-sprinting Denmark's Jakob Fuglsang by the Copacabana after Vincenzo Nibali's hopes ended in a high-speed crash on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Cycling-Van Avermaet Strikes Gold, Agony for Nibali
headline.main: Cycling-Van Avermaet Strikes Gold, Agony for Nibali

snippet: Belgium's Greg Van Avermaet snatched gold in a thrilling finish to the men's Olympic road race, out-sprinting Denmark's Jakob Fuglsang by the Copacabana after Vincenzo Nibali's hopes ended in a high-speed crash on Saturday....
